title: Hartford Line & Valley Flyer: Sunday Northbound Timetable
heading: Hartford Line & Valley Flyer: Sunday Northbound
programmers_notes: Weasyprint won't make an italic version of the SpartanTT font, so don't bother to try to style CTrail the way Connecticut does
top_text: CTrail Hartford Line trains (#64XX) are not ticketed or operated by Amtrak; CTrail tickets must be bought at the station. See notes at bottom.
bottom_text:
CTrail tickets are valid for all CTRail trains, and for Amtrak trains from Springfield to New Haven except for the Vermonter and during holiday blackout periods on Northeast Regionals.
The CTrail Hartford Line website has full schedules for services where CTrail tickets are valid, including additional Hartford-New Haven buses.
